name: Medium
short_description:
Never has customer experience been as critical as it is in today’s
inter-networked world, where customers trust other customers more than
long_description:
Medium is rethinking how ideas and stories are shared with the world. We
believe: - Great ideas can come from anywhere - People create better things
together - Design matters at a deep level We also care deeply about how media
shapes the lives of individuals and the decisions of society — and we think it
can be better. We have a world-class engineering and design team, which we are
looking to grow slowly and deliberately. Let us know if you're interested.
